title: Kesler
description: Intuitive and user-friendly web platform for a legal agency in Buenos Aires. The website integrates sleek design elements and simple functionality to enhance the user experience.
development: Made with VueJS, PHP and MySQL

title: Cordero Gaucho
description: Dynamic and visually appealing platform for Cordero Gaucho, a meat provider specializing in authentic Argentine lamb products. The website features a modern design with easy navigation and a responsive layout to ensure a seamless experience on any device. Users can effortlessly browse the product catalog and reach out via WhatsApp to complete their purchases.
development: Made with VueJS, PHP, MySQL and the Meta API to integrate Instagram posts

title: Madrefoca
description: A dynamic and interactive page that includes microinteractions, smooth animations and transitions to enhance the user experience.
development: Made with Webflow, custom HTML, JS and CSS and vimeo integrations

title: Online News Portal
description: Online news portal with capacity for a robust amount of articles. Common users are able to read an unlimited amount of essay and news uploaded by the organization's writers. Collaborators can access and edit their public profiles and create their pieces from inside the webpage.
development: Made with VueJS, PHP, MySQL and the Meta API to integrate Instagram posts
